oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from William Carroll to James Winchester
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Three-page letter in which American General William Carroll reports General Andrew Jackson's December 23 [1814] engagement with the British in New Orleans. The letter's recipient is General James Winchester.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Carroll, William, 1788-1844;Winchester, James, 1752-1826;New Orleans, Battle of, New Orleans, La., 1815
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Carroll, William, 1788-1844
